Indian Economy.title: Global research firms see US tariff impact of 20-30 bps on India’s GDP growth projection for FY26
Indian Economy.summary: While the US is India’s largest trade partner, the Indian economy is relatively more domestically oriented than most of the region and relies far less on trade

Indian Economy.title: US tariffs may trim India’s GDP growth by 30 bps: Barclays
Indian Economy.summary: Barclays predicts 25% US tariffs may impact Indian GDP by 30 bp, but unlikely to affect domestic demand-driven economy.

Indian Economy.title: India fastest growing major economy, Trump's perception of 'dead economy' misplaced: Analysts
Indian Economy.summary: IMF said India's strong economic performance provides an opportunity to advance critical and challenging structural reforms to realise its ambition of becoming an advanced economy by 2047

Indian Economy.title: Indira Rajaraman: Consider turfing out short-term equity derivatives
Indian Economy.summary: These complex financial instruments have attracted retail traders and diverted money that could have served India’s real economy. Particularly at a time of falling interest rates, the case for banning all weekly equity index derivatives looks strong.

Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | Trump’s tactical rant: Don’t let it work
Indian Economy.summary: The US president’s take on India’s economy seems to betray exasperation but doesn’t alter what’s best for the bilateral trade relationship—nor does it change the reality of India’s dynamism. It’s good that Piyush Goyal made this clear.

Stock Market.title: Share Market Highlights: Nifty ends below 24,600 as global worries, pharma rout drag markets
Stock Market.summary: Sensex, Nifty Updates on 1 August 2025: Indian equity benchmarks ended lower on Friday, marking their fifth consecutive weekly decline—the longest losing streak in two years—as the U.S. reaffirmed steep tariffs, including a 25% duty on India, which stoked glo…

Stock Market.title: Nifty prediction today – July 31, 2025: Nifty 50 July futures: Can oscillate in a range. Stay out
Stock Market.summary: Nifty 50 opens with a gap-down, trading at 24,673, with support at 24,580 and resistance at 24,720.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction today – July 31, 2025: Index nearing a crucial base
Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank index opens lower, public sector banks weaker, potential intraday resistance at 55,800, support at 55,500.

Stock Market.title: Day Trading Guide for August 1, 2025: Intraday supports, resistances for Nifty50 stocks
Stock Market.summary: Day Trading Guide gives you the key intraday supports and resistances to watch out for on the Nifty Futures and other widely traded stocks such as Reliance Industries, Infosys, HDFC Bank, TCS, SBI

Stock Market.title: Day Trading Guide for 31 July, 2025: Intraday supports, resistances for Nifty50 stocks
Stock Market.summary: Day Trading Guide gives you the key intraday supports and resistances to watch out for on the Nifty Futures and other widely traded stocks such as Reliance Industries, Infosys, HDFC Bank, TCS, SBI

Startups & Funding.title: IPV launches $110 mn international angel fund under GIFT City framework
Startups & Funding.summary: Inflection Point Ventures launches $110M angel fund under GIFT City’s IFSCA to invest globally in early-stage startups; first bet on Singapore’s Cellivate.

Startups & Funding.title: In rare big bet, Indian VC backs local cybersecurity firm's $70 mn fundraise
Startups & Funding.summary: Safe Security, a Palo Alto-based cybersecurity firm, has raised $70 million in a Series C round led by Avataar Venture Partners. The funding will focus on product development as the company aims for a public listing in 3-4 years after strong growth.

Startups & Funding.title: Swiggy to re-evaluate Rapido stake citing potential conflict of interest
Startups & Funding.summary: Rapido forayed into food delivery in June in Bengaluru, charging restaurants a fixed fee per order.

Startups & Funding.title: Sustainability Mafia launches ‘Climate-Tech Opportunity Map’
Startups & Funding.summary: SusMafia launches 'Climate-Tech Opportunity Map' to support early-stage entrepreneurs in tackling India's urgent climate challenges.

Banking & Finance.title: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Q1 net profit soars 20% to ₹1,138 crore
Banking & Finance.summary: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance reports 20% growth in net profit, with AUM at ₹2,07,663 crore and CAR at 19.96%.

Banking & Finance.title: Bank credit growth slows to 10.2% in June 2025: RBI
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank credit growth eased to 10.2% in June 2025 from 13.8% last year, with slower demand across agriculture, industry, services, and personal loans: RBI data

Banking & Finance.title: Indira Rajaraman: Consider turfing out short-term equity derivatives
Banking & Finance.summary: These complex financial instruments have attracted retail traders and diverted money that could have served India’s real economy. Particularly at a time of falling interest rates, the case for banning all weekly equity index derivatives looks strong.

Banking & Finance.title: Tata Trusts to Tata Sons: Try everything to stay private, consider exit for SP Group
Banking & Finance.summary: Finally, Tata Trusts makes its view clear on a potential listing of Tata Sons. Also, for the first time, Tata Trusts has expressed its willingness to let the SP Group exit Tata Sons. What's next for Tata Sons?

Banking & Finance.title: RBI unlikely to re-introduce fixed-rate liquidity operations, sources say
Banking & Finance.summary: The fixed rate liquidity operations policy will help banks manage their needs better, several bankers proposed to the RBI in meetings held over the last few months

Technology Sector.title: Cognizant Q2 beats estimates on BFSI strength, but organic growth a concern
Technology Sector.summary: The IT major raised full-year revenue guidance after strong banking demand and large deal wins, but reliance on acquisitions and margin pressure keep investors cautious.

Technology Sector.title: The long arc of an India-US trade deal could end in a win-win
Technology Sector.summary: Talks have turned complex as Trump seems bent on a one-sided deal that New Delhi may find hard to justify. Playing for extra-time past Trump’s 1 August bilateral deal deadline would afford us space to seek concessions that could soften a tariff blow.

Technology Sector.title: TCS layoffs: Can job loss insurance help if you get laid off?
Technology Sector.summary: As TCS announces layoffs affecting 12,200 employees, job loss insurance is in sharp focus again. Here's what to do if you lose your job overnight.

Technology Sector.title: From family vacations to business trips, here's how large foreign expenses affect your taxes
Technology Sector.summary: According to the Income Tax Act, even if your income is tax-exempt, you still need to file an ITR if you spend more than ₹2 lakh on foreign travel for yourself or anyone else.

Technology Sector.title: Trump slaps 25% tariff on Indian goods
Technology Sector.summary: US imposes 25% tariff on Indian goods, criticizes trade policies, potential impact on Indian exporters, uncertain resolution ahead.
